opas.title: Person notices
opas.p: The data for the persons is contained in notices. In very simple cases you can edit your data on the PersonWindow but for more details you need to open the Notice for the data. Press down the to see the notices.
The type of the notice defines what fields are (by default) displayed:

ul.li: Name notice shows name related fields. Name fields are not shown on any other notices.
Note notice displays only a larger note field.
Address notice has address fields open automatically.
A non empty field is always shown.

opas.p: The notice field tools define if you want to keep open the corresponding field:
Notice order can be defined using the Tool - Aux tool command
